casebody.data:
WALTON NC, LLC, et al.
v.
The CITY OF CONCORD 36P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Roy H. Michaux, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, James E. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, Concord, Madeline J. Trilling, Attorney at Law, for Walton North Carolina, LLC, et al. G. Nicholas Herman, Attorney at Law, Valerie Kolczynski, Attorney at Law, for The City of Concord

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of February 2018 by Plaintiffs to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
